menuLayoutSettingsHelperText: Transform your website`s look and feel — select from one of three stunning layout options to captivate your audience!
layout1HelperText: Elevate your website with our sleek and modern layout with this option!
layout2HelperText: Experience a classic and timeless design with this layout option!
layout3HelperText: Embrace creativity with our dynamic and flexible website layout
signInSettingsHelperText: Fine-tune your user experience by toggling the Sign-In feature. Customize access effortlessly!
signUpSettingsHelperText: Manage the gateway to your platform by controlling access through streamlined sign-up settings.
loginLayoutHelperText: Tailor your platform`s sign-in and sign-up experience, including layout customization and access control settings.
loginLayout1HelperText: Classic Elegance: Embrace a timeless design with a touch of sophistication that reflects tradition and refinement.
loginLayout2HelperText: Modern Minimalism: Experience clean lines and contemporary aesthetics that prioritize simplicity and functionality.
loginLayout3HelperText: Vibrant Innovation: Infuse your platform with dynamic visuals and energetic elements that inspire creativity and engagement.
socialMediaLoginHelperText: Unlock seamless access with just a click! Connect effortlessly using Facebook, Google, or Apple for a smoother login experience.
passwordPolicesHelperText: Set stringent password standards tailored to your security needs. Define length requirements and specify character types (letters, numbers, and special characters) to fortify account security.
resetPasswordPoliciesHelperText: Customize password reset policies to enhance security. Specify requirements for initial password reset upon login and subsequent resets initiated by administrators
shouldContainMin01CapitalLetters: Should contain min one capital letters
shouldContainMin01SpecialCharacter: Should contain min one special character
shouldContainMinimum1CapitalLetter: Should contain minimum one capital letter
shouldContainMinimum1SpecialCharacter: Should contain minimum one special character
resetPasswordAfterSuccessfulFirstLogin: Reset password after successful first login
enforcePasswordResetAfterPasswordReseted: Enforce password reset after password reseted by admin

organisationSettingsHelperText: Elevate your organization`s presence with tailored name and address details. Let`s set the stage!

profileFieldSettings_Content: The Profile Field Settings allow administrators to manage the data collected in user profiles. This includes adding, ordering, and controlling the visibility of profile fields.
profileFieldAddContentForFileUpload: Check the boxes for the file types you wish to allow users to upload. Each checkbox corresponds to a specific file type.

adminManagement_DeactivateConfirmText: Are you certain you want to deactivate this user? Deactivating will revoke their access to the site. You can reactivate the user at any time if needed
